name: St. Teresa of the Andes

locations.description: Carmelite nun in Los Andes, Chile

summary: Teresa of the Andes was a Chilean Carmelite nun who died at the age of 19. Despite her short life, she left behind extensive spiritual writings and is known for her deep mystical experiences and devotion to God. She is the first Chilean saint and the first Discalced Carmelite nun from the Americas to be canonized. Her feast day is celebrated throughout Latin America.
